TI: [Spectral-correlation analysis of the bioelectrical activity of rabbit brain structures during electrosleep].
AB: Changes of electric activity of the rabbit cortical and subcortical structures were studied by means of spectrum-correlation analysis during sleep caused by low-frequency stimulation of the supraoptic hypothalamic nucleus. The electrosleep affected the similarity of the electric events in neocortex and subcortical structures. The disturbance of the spatial synchronization is supposed to be due to the activity of nonsynchronized autonomous bioelectric pace-makers in different brain structures.
TT: Spektral'no-korreliatsionnyi analiz bioelektricheskoi aktivnosti struktur golovnogo mozga krolika pri elektrosne
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1976 May;62(5):649-57.
